name: AmonK47
description:
You didn't get allowed into Heaven, but you're going to get your peaceful rest anyway!

Controls:

W,A,S.D - move

Space - jump, wall jump

Left mouse button - shoot

Created for the SRH Christmas break Game Jam 2020/2021:

Art / Design

Alexander Schyr

Jan Seibicke

Programming / Music

Pascal Pieper
